definition: to form into columns/to organize into teams/formation (of ships or aircraft)
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

sentences.english: Larger 10)amphibious assault forces attack beaches head on in massed formations.
sentences.chinese: 大型的兩棲作戰部隊以大規模編隊正面進攻海灘。

sentences.english: Recently the research of Satellite Formation Flying (SFF) has increased significantly.
sentences.chinese: 目前關於衛星編隊飛行的研究有顯著的增加。

sentences.english: Our combined fleet has recently re-formed.
sentences.chinese: 我們的聯合艦隊最近進行了重新編隊。

sentences.english: Until then, the two fleets accomplished their joint  convoy for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 至此，兩個編隊順利完成首次共同護航任務。

sentences.english: The ashigaru would use spears in formation, particularly against cavalry charges.
sentences.chinese: 足輕可以用矛組成編隊，尤其是在對付騎兵衝鋒時。

sentences.english: You will join convoy at 0800 UTC.
sentences.chinese: 在協調世界時0800時你船加入過運河編隊。

sentences.english: Aviation don't ship formation why such Pang Renni?
sentences.chinese: 航空毋艦編隊爲什麼這麼龐人暱？
編隊8號船必須在船閘停船處待命。

sentences.english: Yesterday, the team conducted a formation practice near Yongshu Reef in the South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，船隊在南海永暑礁附近舉行編隊訓練。

sentences.english: Ice-breaker assistance for convoy will start now.
sentences.chinese: 破冰援助編隊護航現在開始。

sentences.english: Nagase All remaining squadrons, rejoin into attack formation.
sentences.chinese: 殘餘部隊重整編隊，再次進入攻擊陣形。

sentences.english: Assign a 1-day length of reconnaissance to any of your formations .
sentences.chinese: 分配偵察1天的時間長短到任何的你的編隊。
破冰援助編隊護航已完成。

sentences.english: Two-plane formation is an important mode of formation in air-to-ground combats.
sentences.chinese: 雙機編隊是空防對抗中一種主要的編隊模式。

sentences.english: Two-plane formation is an important mode of formation in air-to-ground combats.

sentences.english: Aircraft carrier fleet has diversiform campaign abilities for attack and defense.
sentences.chinese: 航母編隊具有攻防兼備的多種作戰能力。
